greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n, n mod k = 1} k^2.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: -x^2/(1 - x) + Sum_{k>=1} k^2*x^(k+1)/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 17 2017
program: (PARI) concat([0], vector(50, n, n++; sigma(n-1, 2) -1)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 28 2019
(MAGMA) [0] cat [DivisorSigma(2, n-1) -1: n in [2..50]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 28 2019
(Sage) [0] + [sigma(n-1, 2) - 1 for n in (2..50)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 28 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2000
